title: COVID-19 Vaccinations Now Available - Tarzana Treatment Centers
description: Relieve yourself of the worry and stay healthy with the COVID-19 vaccine today. Protect yourself. Protect your loved ones. Get your free COVID-19 vaccine at Tarzana Treatment Centers.
cleaned_text: COVID-19 Vaccinations Now Available You've made it this far. Between washing your hands, wearing a mask, and keeping your distance, you kept yourself safe from the COVID-19 virus. Now it's time to take the next step for you and everyone else. Relieve yourself of the worry and stay healthy with the COVID-19 vaccine today. Protect yourself. Protect your loved ones. Get your free COVID-19 vaccine at Tarzana Treatment Centers. Open a flyer below for more information. ¡Ha llegado hasta distancia, se mantuvo a salvo del virus COVID-19. Ahora es el momento de dar el Obtenga su vacuna COVID-19 gratuita en Tarzana Treatment Centers, Inc.
